author: @futbolportaluy
title: Argentina: Deportivo Riestra le ganÃ³ 2-0 a River Plate. Boselli cometiÃ³ un penalazo
text: FÃºtbolUy. Seguinos en Twitter [@futbolportaluy](https://twitter.com/futbolportaluy) River Plate cayÃ³ 2-0 en su visita a Deportivo Riestra por la quinta fecha de la Liga Profesional del fÃºtbol argentino y quedÃ³ sexto con nueve puntos, a uno de Racing, Talleres, HuracÃ¡n, UniÃ³n y Gimnasia y Esgrima La Plata, que es el Ãºnico que ya jugÃ³ por esta etapa. En el cierre de su semestre, por haber sido el Ãºltimo partido antes del parate por la Copa AmÃ©rica, el conjunto dirigido por MartÃ­n Demichelis mostrÃ³ una pobre imagen y, sin sus jugadores citados para la Copa AmÃ©rica, volviÃ³ a perder como visitante. Alan Barrionuevo abriÃ³ el tanteador a los 56â€™ con un buen golpe de cabeza y NicolÃ¡s Benegas liquidÃ³ el pleito a los 92â€™, cuando capitalizÃ³ un clarÃ­simo penal que le cometiÃ³ el uruguayo SebastiÃ¡n Boselli despuÃ©s de un saque de banda que lo encontrÃ³ mal parado. El zaguero ex Defensor Sporting disputÃ³ todo el encuentro al igual que su compatriota NicolÃ¡s Fonseca. Deportivo Riestra, de la mano de Christian Ogro Fabbiani como director tÃ©cnico, le ganÃ³ a San Lorenzo 1-0 en el debut y luego sufriÃ³ tres derrotas al hilo, por lo que llegÃ³ a seis puntos con la victoria de hoy. FÃºtbolUy. Seguinos en Twitter [@futbolportaluy](https://twitter.com/futbolportaluy)

author: Neil Long
title: Netflix adds WWE 2K games, quietly ditches multiple indie and double-A titles
text:
Netflix is adding 2Kâ€™s WWE games to its games roster â€“ but is also quietly removing multiple indie and double-A games from its current offering and future release slate.
The streaming giant said today that the WWE 2K games are coming to the service this autumn, as well as stating that there will be new interactive fiction games based on Netflix shows Ginny & Georgia, Sweet Magnolias, Love is Blind and Outer Banks, under its Netflix Stories brand.
But in keeping with the ongoing strategy shift at the streaming giant, itâ€™s also quietly removing some indie and double-A titles from its live roster and forthcoming release slate.
Whatâ€™s on Netflix spotted that six games previously announced as coming in 2025 are no longer on the way. The streaming giant confirmed that Tales of the Shire, Thirsty Suitors, Compass Point: West, plus three games from indie dev Klei, Donâ€™t Starve Together, Lab Rat and Rotwood, will no longer be coming to Netflix games.
From Tuesday: â€˜How Netflix greenlights gamesâ€™. Netflix told Whatâ€™s on Netflix that the decision not to add them to the service is â€œpart of adjusting our portfolio as we learn more about what our members like.â€ Netflix PR also confirmed the same information to mobilegamer.biz.
The same report notes that several other indie/double-A games have been removed from the service recently, including Ustwoâ€™s Delta: The Memories Between, Ubisoftâ€™s Mighty Quest Rogue Palace and Yacht Club Gamesâ€™ Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon.
The shift away from indie and double-A type games makes sense in light of last weekâ€™s Netflix earnings call, in which coCEO Greg Peters said the firm is refocusing on more mainstream fare â€“ mostly narrative, party, kids and known-IP games.
â€œWe continue to refine our strategy,â€ he told investors. â€œAnd weâ€™re going to be focusing on more narrative games based on Netflix IP. These are consistent fan favorites and weâ€™ve got a lot in the library to work with there.â€
From last week: â€˜Netflix is refocusing on narrative, party, kids and known-IP gamesâ€™. â€œWeâ€™ll also be introducing party and couch co-op games on TV delivered from the cloud. We think of this as a successor to family board game night or an evolution of what the game show on TV used to be.â€
Peters continued: â€œWeâ€™ll deliver games for kids. This is no ads, no in-app payments. Itâ€™s a safe space for kids just included with your subscription.â€
â€œAnd of course, we want to do more recognizable mainstream titles, whether that is licensed titles like GTA and weâ€™re going to have more of those big licensed titles to come that weâ€™re looking forward to as well as homegrown titles based on our IP like Squid Game: Unleashedâ€.
As we reported recently , Netflix is also currently hiring for what it has described as a Stardew Valley-like life sim drived by AI, plus projects involving â€œdual-screen gamingâ€.

author: Brad Cox
title: Cristiano Ronaldo 900 goals: Remembering best CR7 strikes for club and country as he sets new goal-scoring record | Sporting News Canada
text: Cristiano Ronaldo has set yet another astonishing record by scoring his 900th career goal, a milestone that solidifies his status as one of the greatest footballers the world has ever seen. It's nearly impossible to imagine any other male player ever reaching this incredible feat. From his early days at Sporting CP to his stints with Manchester United, Real Madrid, Juventus, and currently Al Nassr, Ronaldo's career has been nothing short of legendary. His accolades include five Ballon d'Or awards, numerous titles across three of Europe's top five leagues, and five UEFA Champions League trophies. Part of Portugal's winning Euro 2016 side, [Ronaldo also boasts the record for most international goals scored by a male player](https://www.sportingnews.com/ca/soccer/news/most-goals-scored-international-football-messi-ronaldo-record/osiuroawzw1asvbi2t37z2be) and is the only man to have played more than 200 games for his senior national team. On September 5, 2024, Ronaldo struck his historic 900th goal, meeting a pinpoint cross from the left from Nuno Mendes before turning the ball home from close range, doubling Portugal's lead against Croatia in the UEFA Nations League. He was clearly emotional as he celebrated the famous moment. Cristiano Ronaldo was emotional after scoring his 900th goal of his career â¤ï¸â€” ESPN FC (@ESPNFC) [pic.twitter.com/yVfDJYS0Ih] [September 5, 2024] The Sporting News takes a look back at seven of Ronaldo's greatest goals of all time. MORE: [When will Cristiano Ronaldo retire?](https://www.sportingnews.com/ca/soccer/news/when-will-cristiano-ronaldo-retire-portugal/1b0baeb8b9e2fa1f6e183ff5) | [The leading goal-scorers in men's football history](https://www.sportingnews.com/ca/soccer/news/cristiano-ronaldo-goal-scoring-record-list-all-time-scorers/fgg5fejoho0duntnrcze2v7e) Cristiano Ronaldo 900 goals: Best CR7 career strikes In celebration of Ronaldo's achievement and his iconic No. 7 jersey, we revisit seven of his greatest goals from his 900 â€” a fitting tribute to a player synonymous with sustained excellence while wearing one of the sport's most esteemed shirt numbers. 900 GOALS ğŸ˜±â€” The Sporting News (@sportingnews) Cristiano Ronaldo becomes the first soccer player with 900 career goals. [pic.twitter.com/nWBbCr8zKK] [September 5, 2024] Manchester United vs. Portsmouth Date: January 30, 2008 Ronaldo scored this famous free-kick from around 30 yards out in a Premier League match against Portsmouth. His trademark style for striking dead balls at the time left goalkeeper David James rooted to the spot as the ball dipped and swerved perfectly into the top corner. Is thisâ€” Premier League (@premierleague) [@Cristiano]'s greatest Premier League goal? â˜„ï¸ [pic.twitter.com/d0lGpKxkjo] [January 30, 2024] Manchester United vs. Porto Date: April 15, 2009 In a Champions League quarterfinal clash against Porto, Ronaldo scored a sensational goal from nearly 40 yards out. He received the ball in midfield, took a few touches, and unleashed a rocket that flew into the top, helping Man United progress to the semifinals. THREAD: Cristiano Ronaldo Manchester United moments...â€” UEFA Champions League (@ChampionsLeague) ğŸ¤¯ THAT [@Cristiano]wonder-strike against Porto in 2009! [#UCL]| [@ManUtd] [pic.twitter.com/oDcXVK0Rf6] [January 29, 2021] Real Madrid vs. Galatasaray Date: September 17, 2013 Playing for Real Madrid in the Champions League, Ronaldo showcased his dribbling skills and speed with this goal. He picked up the ball near the halfway line, evaded multiple defenders, and calmly finished past the goalkeeper, highlighting his ability to create something out of nothing even in the tightest spaces. Real Madrid vs. Valencia Date: May 4, 2014 In this La Liga match against Valencia, Ronaldo showed remarkable skill and improvisation to score this particular goal. After a low cross from Angel Di Maria, he flicked the ball backwards with his heel, sending it past the goalkeeper and into the net. ğŸ”™|OTD IN 2014:â€” CristianoXtra (@CristianoXtra_) Exactly 7 years ago, Cristiano Ronaldo scored this unique goal against Valencia, Which is selected as the best goal in La Liga 2013/14 season.ğŸ”¥ [pic.twitter.com/jaUUX8rKI3] [May 5, 2021] Real Madrid vs. Juventus Date: April 3, 2018 Again during a Champions League quarterfinal match for Real Madrid against Juventus, Ronaldo executed perhaps the most perfect overhead kick. Het met a cross from Dani Carvajal with an acrobatic bicycle kick, firing the ball into the net past one of the greatest goalkeepers of all time in Gianluigi Buffon. It was such a special goal that it earned a standing ovation from Juventus fans. ğŸ—£ï¸ "It was amazing - probably the best of my career." ğŸ˜â€” UEFA Champions League (@ChampionsLeague) ğŸ˜® A year ago today - one of the great [#UCL]goals - Cristiano Ronaldo's sensational overhead kick in Turin! ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ [#OnThisDay] [@Cristiano] [pic.twitter.com/5nbrzSqXDw] [April 3, 2019] Portugal vs. Spain Date: June 15, 2018 Ronaldo delivered a masterclass in the 2018 World Cup group-stage match against Spain. With Portugal trailing 3-2 in the dying minutes, he won a free-kick just outside the box. Ronaldo stepped up and curled a magnificent shot into the top corner, completing his hat-trick and salvaging a 3-3 draw. What a moment this was... ğŸ¤¯â€” FIFA World Cup (@FIFAWorldCup) One year ago today, [@Cristiano]did this. Where were you? [@selecaoportugal]| [#WorldCup] [pic.twitter.com/b1UZLFrp3S] [June 15, 2019] Juventus vs. Sampdoria Date: December 18, 2019 While playing for Juventus, Ronaldo scored this incredible header against Sampdoria. Rising to meet a cross, he leapt to an unbelievable height, hanging in the air for what seemed like an eternity before powerfully heading the ball into the net. The impeccable timing of the header is a thing of beauty in itself. Quandoâ€” JuventusFC (@juventusfc) [@Cristiano]âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸âœˆï¸ [#JuveSamp] [pic.twitter.com/NMERcj0Jnc] [July 26, 2020] Cristiano Ronaldo 900th career goal After a difficult campaign at Euro 2024, when it seemed as though he would never score no matter how many shots he attempted, Ronaldo scored in the first half of his next appearance for his country to reach the 900-goal mark. Nuno Mendes swung in a cross from the left wing, and Ronaldo timed his run perfectly to meet the delivery and side-foot the ball first time into the net from six yards out. ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¹ When you score your NINEHUNDRETH career goal...â€” beIN SPORTS (@beINSPORTS_EN) ğŸ‘ Cristiano Ronaldo is UNBELIEVABLE. [#beINNATIONSLEAGUE] [pic.twitter.com/V3awbzuK0c] [September 5, 2024]

author: Lyon Mag
title: La RÃ©gion Auvergne-RhÃ´ne-Alpes condamnÃ©e pour ne pas avoir respectÃ© la mise en place d'un menu vÃ©gÃ©tarien par semaine dans les lycÃ©es
text:
Le tribunal administratif de Lyon a condamnÃ© la collectivitÃ© pour avoir refusÃ© de prendre les mesures propres Ã  garantir le respect de lâ€™obligation de proposer un repas vÃ©gÃ©tarien hebdomadaire dans les lycÃ©es dont elle a la charge. Une mesure mise en place en novembre 2019 Ã  travers la loi Egalim.
La condamnation survient aprÃ¨s la plainte de lâ€™Association Justice Animaux Savoie (AJAS) dÃ©posÃ©e en 2023. Lâ€™association avait constatÃ© que certains lycÃ©es de la rÃ©gion Auvergne RhÃ´ne-Alpes ne respectaient pas la loi imposant un menu vÃ©gÃ©tarien obligatoire par semaine.
MalgrÃ© des demandes de lâ€™association, la RÃ©gion n'avait pas fourni les documents prouvant quâ€™il mettait tout en Å“uvre pour faire appliquer la loi dans les Ã©tablissements. Florence Dubessy, vice-prÃ©sidente dÃ©lÃ©guÃ©e Ã  lâ€™Education avait mÃªme dÃ©clarÃ© dans certains mÃ©dias que "la RÃ©gion nâ€™entend pas se soumettre aux injonctions dÃ©lirantes dâ€™associations extrÃ©mistes minoritaires".
Le tribunal administratif de Lyon donne donc un mois Ã  la RÃ©gion pour agir. Elle doit Ã©galement verser 1500 euros Ã  lâ€™AJAS.

author: Marie Lemaistre
title: "On se sent attaquÃ©" : dÃ©pÃ´t de plainte aprÃ¨s des dÃ©gradations Ã  la Croix-Rouge prÃ¨s du Havre | 76actu
text:
76actu Â« On se dit que ce nâ€™est pas sympa parce quâ€™on essaie dâ€™aiderâ€¦ Â» Mardi 26 dÃ©cembre 2023, alors quâ€™ils sâ€™apprÃªtaient Ã  prendre leur poste aux environs de 7h30, les Ã©quipes du matin du centre de santÃ© infirmier de la Croix-Rouge de Port-JÃ©rÃ´me-sur-Seine ( Seine-Maritime ), rue Bernardin Saint-Pierre, dÃ©couvrent six vÃ©hicules de fonction vandalisÃ©s.
Â« Cela a dÃ» se passer soit le 25 trÃ¨s tard, soit le 26 trÃ¨s tÃ´t. Nos Ã©quipes finissent Ã  19 heures et nos soignants nâ€™ont pas vu grand-chose, les voisins non plus Â», sâ€™Ã©tonne la cadre de santÃ©.
De la casse importante LÃ  des rÃ©troviseurs cassÃ©s , ici, des vitres arriÃ¨re brisÃ©es. Rien dâ€™assez dommageable pour mettre hors service les voitures. Â« Il y en a quelques-unes qui nâ€™ont pas pu rouler, mais aucune nâ€™est hors dâ€™usage Â», pointe la responsable du service.
Ã€ lire aussi
PrÃ¨s du Havre, un homme surpris par la police en train de voler les roues dâ€™une BMW Tous les vÃ©hicules concernÃ©s, avec lesquels les soignants rÃ©alisent des tournÃ©es Ã  domicile, ont dÃ» Ãªtre immobilisÃ©s pour partir en rÃ©paration.
Le centre comprend notamment une unitÃ© spÃ©cialisÃ©e dans les patients Alzheimer, un service infirmier et un autre composÃ© dâ€™aides-soignants, qui se partagent les vÃ©hicules.
Â« On a eu lâ€™impression de se sentir attaquer Â» Â« Le jour mÃªme, on a fait quand mÃªme les soins normalement, on a gÃ©rÃ© Â», rassure la responsable qui admet un choc Ã  la dÃ©couverte des faits.
On a eu l'impression de se sentir attaquer. En tant que Croix-Rouge, on apporte aussi du rÃ©confort aux gens, on est lÃ  Ã  NoÃ«l, les jours fÃ©riÃ©s... On ne comprend pas qu'on cherche Ã  dÃ©grader des vÃ©hicules qui servent Ã  aider les gens
une cadre de santÃ© de la Croix-Rouge Les actes de vandalisme ont Ã©tÃ© commis sur le parking privÃ© rattachÃ© Ã  la structure. Tous les vÃ©hicules, treize au total, Ã©taient garÃ©s Ã  lâ€™extÃ©rieur et sont floquÃ©s Croix-Rouge.
VidÃ©os : en ce moment sur Actu Mais, dâ€™aprÃ¨s la cadre de santÃ©, le service nâ€™a pas Ã©tÃ© le seul visÃ© cette nuit-lÃ  . Dâ€™autres vÃ©hicules du voisinage ont en effet subi la mÃªme hargne, dans ce quartier pourtant Â« tranquille Â», Â« Ã  deux pas Â» de la police municipale.
Pas la premiÃ¨re fois La responsable Ã©voque des dÃ©gradations, lÃ©gÃ¨res, contre des vÃ©hicules, il y a quelques semaines dÃ©jÃ . Â« Des rÃ©troviseurs avaient nÃ©cessitÃ© des rÃ©parations, des personnes avaient dÃ» frapper fort dedans. Â»
Ã€ lire aussi
Guerre en Ukraine : une vingtaine de rÃ©fugiÃ©s accueillie au Havre par la Croix-Rouge Presque rien par rapport Ã  cette nuit du lundi 25 au mardi 26 dÃ©cembre. Pour ces dÃ©gradations, la Croix-Rouge a dÃ©posÃ© plainte le jour mÃªme .
Pour ce qui est des rÃ©parations, la structure nâ€™a pas encore de montant chiffrÃ©, mais devrait solliciter les assurances.
